title: User Registration Success
description: Verify user can register successfully with valid email and password and is assigned the default Free role.

steps.description: Navigate to the registration page
Input a valid email, strong password, and required fields
Submit the registration form
Confirm the user account is created successfully and user is assigned Free role
Verify user is redirected to the Dashboard page after registration

title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify user can login successfully with registered email and correct password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid email and password
Click the login button
User is authenticated and redirected to the Dashboard
User role-based widgets and features display according to their assigned role

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login fails with incorrect email or password and appropriate error is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter incorrect email or password
Click login button
Display an error message indicating invalid credentials
User remains on login page without access to dashboard

title: XP Progression and Level Up
description: Verify XP is tracked correctly and user level increases appropriately when XP thresholds are met.

steps.description: Complete activities that grant XP such as lessons, habits, challenges
Check XP progress widget updates with the acquired XP
When XP thresholds for level are reached, verify user level increments
Confirm new level is displayed across dashboard and profile

title: Habit Tracking with Streaks
description: Verify user can create habits, mark daily completions, and streak counts update properly in habit tracker and calendar.

steps.description: Navigate to habit tracking page
Create a new habit with name and schedule
Mark habit as complete for the current day
Streak count increases by one
Advance date and mark habit complete again
Streak count continues to increase
Skip a day and check streak reset behavior
Streak resets to zero after missed day

title: Course Enrollment and Progress Tracking
description: Verify users can browse course catalog, enroll in a course, and course progress is saved after watching lessons.

steps.description: Login and navigate to course catalog page
Search and select a course
Enroll in the chosen course
Enrollment confirmation is shown
Start watching a video lesson within the course player
Watch a portion or full lesson
Course progress updates to reflect lesson completion or playback position

title: Teacher Course Creation Flow
description: Verify that users with Teacher role can create new courses, add details, upload lessons, and save successfully.

steps.description: Login as a user with Teacher role
Navigate to course creation page
Input required course information (title, description, category)
Upload at least one video lesson
Submit the course for creation
Course is created and appears in catalog under Teacher's courses
No errors encountered during creation

title: Community Posting and Interaction
description: Verify users can create posts, comment, like, and participate in challenges on the social feed.

steps.description: Navigate to community page
Create a new post with title and rich text content
Post appears on social feed immediately
Comment on an existing post
Comment is displayed under the post
Like a post or comment
Like count increments accordingly
Join an active community challenge
User participation in challenge is recorded and reflected

title: Subscription Purchase and Role Upgrade
description: Verify users can subscribe to paid plans via Stripe, payment processes securely, and user roles update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Pricing page as a Free user
Select a paid subscription plan
Enter valid payment information and submit
Payment is processed successfully via Stripe
User role upgrades to corresponding paid role immediately
Access to premium features is enabled

title: Profile Settings Update and Avatar Customization
description: Verify users can update profile settings, including display name and avatar image, and changes persist after save.

steps.description: Navigate to Profile settings page
Change display name and upload a new avatar image
Save profile changes
Profile updates persist on page reload and reflect in user menu/avatar components

title: Responsive UI in Mobile and Desktop
description: Verify UI components render correctly across mobile and desktop viewports with glassmorphism styling and usable touch targets.

steps.description: Open the platform in desktop browser and verify dashboard and all pages layout
UI matches design specifications with glassmorphism effect and widgets visible
Resize window or open on mobile device
Layout adapts to mobile with appropriate stacking, navigation, and touch target sizes
No horizontal scroll or clipped content
Safe area insets and header/footer spacing are correct

title: Skills Tracking and Radar Chart Update
description: Verify skills progress is tracked in all categories and is accurately visualized on radar charts under profile and mastery pages.

steps.description: Complete various activities in cognitive, creative, discipline, and social domains
Skills service updates stored values correspondingly
Navigate to Skills section or user profile
Radar chart visualizes the current skill levels correctly in all categories

title: Achievements Badge Display and Update
description: Verify achievements earned by users are displayed as badges on dashboard and profile, and update immediately after qualifying activity.

steps.description: Perform achievement-qualifying actions, e.g., completing first course or habit streak milestones
New achievement badges appear under Achievements widget and user profile
Achievement counts and progress trackers update accordingly

title: Error Handling and Loading States
description: Verify that the application displays user-friendly error messages and loading indicators during data fetch failures or slow network.

steps.description: Simulate server errors or network failures on key API calls (e.g., course loading, habit save, subscription payment)
Appropriate error messages are displayed indicating the issue
Loading spinners or skeletons display while waiting for data
UI remains responsive and user can retry or navigate away

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Verify users cannot access unauthorized features or pages according to their role (Free, Student, Teacher, Admin).

steps.description: Login as Free user and attempt to access teacher-specific pages or admin panel
Access is denied or redirected with appropriate message
Login as Student and try to access subscription management or course creation
Access denied enforced
Login as Teacher and verify access to course creation and management features
Access is allowed with full functionality
